name: Monster Business
description:
Monster Business is a platform game which was released in 1991 by Eclipse Software Design. The aim of the game is to remove monsters from a construction yard by inflating them. The player must get close to them without being touched and start pumping. The inflated monsters slowly float skywards and knock other creatures off the construction scaffolding if they are hit.

Monster Business was programmed by Fabian Hammer. The graphics were done by Michael Grohe, Tim Lange and Sven Bauer. The music was composed by Laurens Tummers and John Tonnard.
